summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4547 for the improvement of Temple Place, from East Fir Street to East Jefferson Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53192, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
